issues.description: Value prop 'Operating system for small businesses' is too vague - doesn't explain what it actually does or why it's needed
issues.rationale: Small business owners won't understand how this solves their specific pain points

issues.description: No clear objection handling for 'I don't have time to learn a new system' - major barrier for busy owners
issues.rationale: Time investment fear is bigger than price for overwhelmed business owners

issues.description: Pricing tier comparison lacks concrete outcomes - just lists features instead of business results
issues.rationale: Owners care about revenue/time saved, not feature counts

issues.description: Trust signals use generic logos without context - no indication of business size/type relevance
issues.rationale: Small businesses need to see peers, not enterprise logos

issues.description: Tagline 'Stop carrying the system in your head' doesn't connect to measurable business benefits
issues.rationale: Mental relief isn't quantifiable - needs revenue/efficiency angle

issues.description: FAQ only addresses pricing objections, ignores control/delegation fears that 'hand it off' triggers
issues.rationale: Business owners fear losing control when delegating

issues.description: Competitor comparison grid focuses on features not outcomes - missing emotional differentiation
issues.rationale: Feature wars don't win hearts - need transformation stories

issues.description: No clear migration/onboarding messaging - huge hidden objection for switching systems
issues.rationale: Switching costs kill conversions even with better products

issues.description: Pricing transparency claim but no actual prices shown - creates trust deficit immediately
issues.rationale: Claiming transparency without showing prices is contradictory

issues.description: Urgency elements (red CTAs) clash with 'retain control' messaging - sends mixed signals

suggestedFixes.fix: Change to 'Turn your business chaos into automated systems that run without you - in 14 days'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Specific outcome + timeline = clarity on transformation

suggestedFixes.fix: Add '5-minute daily commitment' badge and '2-week implementation guarantee' to hero
suggestedFixes.rationale: Addresses time fear upfront with specific commitment

suggestedFixes.fix: Replace feature lists with outcome metrics: 'Save 10hrs/week', 'Handle 50% more clients', 'Scale to $1M'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Business outcomes resonate more than feature counts

suggestedFixes.fix: Show '327 businesses under $500K revenue' with industry breakdown chart instead of logos
suggestedFixes.rationale: Peer validation through numbers beats ambiguous logos

suggestedFixes.fix: Update tagline to 'From 60-hour weeks to 40 - systematically'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Quantifiable time benefit with method promise

suggestedFixes.fix: Add control retention section: 'You approve every automation before it runs'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Directly addresses delegation fear with control promise

suggestedFixes.fix: Replace feature grid with before/after day-in-the-life timeline comparison
suggestedFixes.rationale: Emotional transformation story beats feature lists

suggestedFixes.fix: Lead with 'Import from Excel/QuickBooks in 1 click - keep your data, upgrade your systems'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Migration ease removes switching friction upfront

suggestedFixes.fix: Show actual prices: Basic $97/mo, Standard $297/mo, Premium $597/mo with ROI calculator
suggestedFixes.rationale: Real transparency builds trust and qualifies leads

suggestedFixes.fix: Replace red urgency with progress green: 'Join 327 owners taking back their time'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Social momentum without pressure aligns with empowerment
